"Artie": "Been making use of those Advanced Trainia?"

"You've got some serious skill. You should make a point of
trying to hone your abilities."
"Hey, great timing. I've got something I want to talk to you about."
"Remember how I had you take on Cannonball Rumble?"
"Well, that's actually not the only Advanced Trainia out there."
"In Cannonball Strike, the timing of your throws is vital."
"Been making use of those Advanced Trainia?"
"I'm expecting great things from you. Keep striving to improve yourself!"
